column2: p <- ggplot(data=temp, aes(x=County, y=value, fill = variable)) +geom_bar(stat='identity', position='dodge') + theme_classic() + xlab('')+ ylab('')+ ggtitle("County Level Total VHT")+ theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle = -45, hjust = 0))+ scale_y_continuous(labels=comma)+ labs(fill = "") + scale_fill_manual(values=c("#edf8b1", "#7fcdbb", "#2c7fb8"))
